page.title: 02HOLT TOWN TODAY-continued
page.content: 8. SUPERSTORE-GENERAL STORE & 9. THE VILLAGE BAKERY ACROSS THE ROAD FROM THE CROSS ARE "THE JAILS"WHICH ARE VERY OLD.THE CHURCH IS ALSO VERY OLD.IT WAS BUILT IN 1281 AND IS NOW 704 YEARS OLD.THE CHURCH HAS ONE BELL WHICH IS PULLED BY MR POWELL.EVERY 15 MINUTES THE CLOCK ON THE CHURCH TOWER STRIKES.THE CHURCH IS A TALL BUILDING WITH THREE STAINED GLASS WINDOWS WHICH HAVE THREE COLOURFUL SAINTS ON THEM.THE CHURCH IS CALLED{ST CHADS}. THERE ARE 4 PUBLIC HOUSES IN HOLT:-THE WHITE LIONS,THE RED LION,THE HAND AND HEARTAND THE GREDINGTON ARMS. THE CASTLE IS BY THE RIVER DEE WHICH RUNS THROUGH HOLT.ONLY THE RUINS REMAIN OF THE CASTLE BECAUSE WHEN THE ROUNDHEADS AND THE CAVALIERS FOUGHT THE CASTLE WAS BOMBED. THE BRIDGE WHICH CROSSES HOLT TO
